data.title: Tribute for Robert Craig Sterling
authors: Kent-Forest Lawn Funeral Home and Cemeteries
data.meta_description: Tribute for Robert Craig Sterling | Major Robert C. Sterling, BCSO, (Ret.), 66 of Lynn Haven, passed away April 23, 2018 at Gulf Coast Medical Center. Robert was born to A.R. and Irene (Musgrove) Sterling and was a life-long...
data.meta_site_name: Tribute for Robert Craig Sterling | Kent-Forest Lawn Funeral Home and Cemetery
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
